page.title: 11Carlton Catholic Church
page.content: This church dedicated to Saint Mary is on the main street.It was built in l842 with money donated by the Beaumont family who lived in Carlton Towers where the Duke of Norfolk now lives.It is built in white brick with stone dressings.Adjoining the church is a presbytery and a school which was used until l876.Nuns ran the school for 4O years and then a school master.It was closed at about the time of the Second World War and is now used as a joiners shop. There is a large Catholic community in Carlton due to the inlfuence of the Beaumont family,who built the church and the Duke of Norfolk who is the most important Catholic nobleman in England.Many people live in Carlton because of the Catholic church and secondary school.The present priest is called Father Maudesley.
